content:
/>
III.ii.2.F.3.e
.
Determining Whether NPRC Previously Searched for SGO Extracts for a Specific Veteran
If NPRC responded to a VA request for STRs
after
May 18, 1990, assume NPRC included copies of any existing extracts in its response, or
prior
to May 18, 1990, and the fire in 1973 at NPRC might have destroyed the Veteran’s service records, submit a new PIES request using request code
M06-V
.
Note
:  May 18, 1990, represents the date NPRC finished decoding information contained in the extracts.
References
:  For more information on
service records that the fire at NPRC destroyed, see
M21-1, Part III, Subpart ii, 2.F.1
, and
PIES, see the
PIES User Guide
.
title: M21-1, Part III, Subpart ii, Chapter 2, Section F - Fire-Related Records, Supplementary or Substitute Records, and Records for Unique Situations
citation: Part III, Subpart ii, Chapter 2, Section F
